title: Spice Cake with Buttermilk Nutmeg Icing
ingredients: ['170g butter or margarine', '300g dark brown soft sugar', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '340ml buttermilk', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '3/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '120g chopped pecans or walnuts', 'Icing', '50g butter', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '375g icing sugar, sifted', '60ml buttermilk']
